name: Axure
description:
Easily copy frames from Figma to Axure RP or publish frames directly to Axure Cloud.


Copying frames from Figma to Axure RP lets you quickly bring your designs to life with the powerful prototyping capabilities of Axure RP. Simply select your frames in Figma and use this plugin to copy them. Then in Axure RP, paste your design onto the canvas. This feature requires Axure RP version 9.0.0.3694 or newer.


Publishing Frames to Axure Cloud allows you to collaborate with your team, build basic prototypes, and seamlessly hand off visual assets and CSS to the development team. Now, you can keep your RP prototypes and Figma designs in one place! Youâ€™ll need to install the Axure Cloud desktop app before using this feature.
